game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the nefarious thief, Grimgold Ironfist.
game.description: Grimgold Ironfist has been spotted in the vicinity of the old windmill on the outskirts of town. He's known to be particularly fond of shiny objects and may have hidden the heirloom amongst his treasure hoard.
game.reward: A Golden Amulet worth 100 gold pieces

tasks.objective: Investigate Grimgold Ironfist's alibi for the time of the theft.
tasks.description: Speak to the local blacksmith, Thorgrim Stonebeard, who may have information about Grimgold's whereabouts on the night of the theft.
Search the old windmill for any signs of the stolen heirloom or clues to its location.
tasks.location: The old windmill on the outskirts of town

tasks.objective: Confront Grimgold Ironfist and retrieve the heirloom.
tasks.description: Accompany Lady Whimsy to Grimgold's lair and negotiate the return of the stolen item.
